abilities.name: Smoke Transformation
abilities.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke at will. As a Logia-type, physical attacks pass through the user's smoke body.
abilities.limitations: Like all Logia users, can be hit by Haki users or when caught off guard with Seastone.

abilities.name: White Blow
abilities.description: The user transforms their arms into smoke and blasts opponents with tremendous force, combining smoke manipulation with physical impact.
abilities.limitations: Requires close to medium range to be effective.

abilities.name: Smoke Capture
abilities.description: The user can surround targets with intangible smoke and then solidify it to trap and immobilize them.
abilities.limitations: Strong opponents may be able to break free.

keyMoments.title: Moku Moku no Mi First Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Smoker demonstrates his Moku Moku no Mi powers for the first time, transforming into smoke and easily defeating Gally and his crew.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this Logia-type Devil Fruit and the first Logia user that Luffy will need to face, establishing a new level of threat.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
Can be hit by Haki users who can bypass Logia intangibility

reveals.information: Current user is Marine Captain Smoker
Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows transformation into smoke
Grants ability to create, control, and become smoke
